modmenu.descriptionTranslation.no_caves: Disables Noise Caves, Density Function Caves, Carver Caves, and Carver Canyons based on the configuration, and maintains compatibility with other terrain modification mods and data packs as much as possible. Affects all biomes and all world generation presets by default.
tooltip.no_caves.map.name: Name
option.no_caves.enableCarverFilter.toolt: Set to %s to enable the carver filter.
option.no_caves.disabledCarverPatterns.t: The specified carvers will be filtered.
option.no_caves.carverFilterBiomeExclusi: Patterns of carver filters' biome exclusion
The specified biome will not be affected by carver filter.
option.no_caves.biomeSpecificOverrideFor: Biome-specific overrides for patterns of disabled carvers

The specified biome will filter out 
carvers with the corresponding value. Overrides 
patterns of disabled carvers within the current biome.
option.no_caves.enableDensityFunctionTra: Set to %s to enable the density function transformation
option.no_caves.densityFunctionToTransfo: Patterns of density function to transform
The specified density function will be transformed.
option.no_caves.enableFinalDensityTransf: Set to %s to enable the final density transformation
option.no_caves.finalDensityTransformati: Patterns of final density transformation exclusions
The specified noise settings' final density will not be transformed.
option.no_caves.enableNoiseCaveFilter.to:
Set to %s to enable noise cave filter, 
which filters noise caves in density functions
(including the final density).
option.no_caves.noiseCavePatterns.toolti: The names of the noise caves to filter.
option.no_caves.enableDensityFunctionCav:
Set to %s to enable density function cave filter, 
which filters references to other cave 
density functions in density functions
(including the final density).
option.no_caves.densityFunctionCavePatte: The names of the density functions cave to filter.
